attributes.action: Propose to parliament, that the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority should be abolished
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is not good value at £6.5m p.a. to run: the work should be outsourced to accountants instead.
A London accountant charges roughly £1200 p.a. to manage the books of a small company, therefore administering the expenses of 646 M.P.s should cost considerably less than £1,000,000 p.a.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
